amendment.description: Amendment to the Foxx amendment (A007) sought to reduce funding for the Office of the Secretary and Executive Management by $8,961,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to replace the dollar amount proposed in the Foxx amendment for the Office of the Secretary and Executive Management with "$8,961,000".

action.text: Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. McHenry to the Foxx amendment (A007).

vote.text: On agreeing to the McHenry amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 108 - 300 (Roll no. 466).
